mapper.sql: id, name, head_img, bg_img, phone, password, sha, salt, sex, birthday, area, school_id, academy_id, stu_num, signature, is_particular, is_match, is_rank, violator, express_time, experience, title_id, paper, level
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
